Scripts.PreClick: if self:GetChecked() then PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOff") else PlaySound("igMainMenuOptionCheckBoxOn") end

Scripts.OnShow: local halfwidth = (PoJ_GetResolution().width - MainMenuBar:GetWidth()) / 2 PoJ_SetupSlider(PoJ_Slider_MenuBarPos, -halfwidth, halfwidth, 1, PoJ_Vars.MenuBarPos) PoJ_Button_MenuBarPos:SetFrameLevel(self:GetFrameLevel() + 1)
